name: @zephyr/figma-plugin
description: Zephyr Figma Plugin - Extract images and generate code from Figma designs

scripts.test: npm run tsc && npm run build
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc:main && npm run tsc:ui
scripts.tsc:watch: concurrently -n plugin,ui "npm run tsc:main -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "npm run tsc:ui -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:main -- --minify
scripts.build:watch: concurrently -n plugin,ui "npm run build:main -- --watch" "npm run build:ui -- --watch"

author: Zephyr Team
